attributes.action: Call a General Election for this year 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in fear of going out at night. We live in fear of having to go into hospital. We live in fear for our children's future. We live in fear of our future. We live in fear ………. This Government has had long enough to be tough on crime and tough on the causes of crime. Long enough to save the NHS. Long enough to educate, educate, educate. Long enough to ………. 
We request the PM and this Government call a General Election for this year 2008.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
